metadata.title: CVE-2019-13173 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: fstream before 1.0.12 is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Overwrite. Extractingtarballs containing a hardlink to a file that already exists in the system,and a file that matches the hardlink, will overwrite the system's file withthe contents of the extracted file. The fstream.DirWriter() function isvulnerable.

criterions.comment: node-fstream: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
